title: Miracles Happen, Thanks to God and YOU | Guest: Bill O'Reilly | 8/20/21
description:
While America is doing practically nothing to save civilians in Afghanistan, other countries are stepping up. This is not what America is supposed to be. Glenn shares some inspiring stories of some of the donators. Bill O’Reilly joins to discuss the Afghanistan catastrophe and Biden’s responsibility. Why are our soldiers being told to stand down by our Pentagon? Glenn expresses how thankful he is for his audience for helping him meet the goal to help the Afghan Christians, but the fight isn't over yet. The FBI released its report on the Capitol riot. Not even CNN can positively report on America’s actions in Afghanistan.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
